entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Hardy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 04:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 4.4°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
